trans-unit.source: Registers an ECMAScript (JavaScript) file for use on an ASP.NET Web page.
trans-unit.target: 註冊 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 檔案以用於 ASP.NET 網頁。

trans-unit.source: You can include a JavaScript file on an ASP.NET Web page by registering it through a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過向註冊包含 ASP.NET Web 網頁上的 JavaScript 檔案<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>物件。

trans-unit.source: You can register a script file that is located as a .js file (a static script file) on the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 您可以註冊的指令碼檔案是位於網站上的.js 檔案 （靜態指令碼檔案）。

trans-unit.source: You can also register a script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以註冊指令碼檔案內嵌為組件中的資源。

trans-unit.source: After registering the script file, you can use its functions in client script on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 註冊的指令碼檔案之後, 您可以使用其用戶端指令碼中的函式在網頁上。

trans-unit.source: To register a static script file, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> object to the relative location of the file.
trans-unit.target: 若要註冊靜態指令碼檔案，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>檔案的相對位置的物件。

trans-unit.source: To register a script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A> property to the name of the assembly that contains the file.
trans-unit.target: 若要註冊指令碼檔案內嵌為組件中的資源，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A>屬性包含檔案的組件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Then set the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> property to the name of the .js file that is embedded in the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 然後設定<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>屬性設為內嵌在組件中的.js 檔案的名稱。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the script file must be embedded, not linked.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，指令碼檔案必須內嵌，未連結。

trans-unit.source: You set the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.ScriptMode%2A> property to indicate whether to use the debug or release version of the script.
trans-unit.target: 您設定<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.ScriptMode%2A>屬性，指出是否要使用偵錯或發行指令碼的版本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto> value produces different results depending on whether it refers to a standalone script file or to a script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto>值產生不同的結果，根據它參考到獨立的指令碼檔案或組件中內嵌為資源的指令碼檔案。

trans-unit.source: A standalone script file is defined with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 獨立的指令碼檔案以定義<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: An assembly reference must be accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 組件參考必須透過<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The results for the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto> value are as follows:
trans-unit.target: 結果<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto>值如下：

trans-unit.source: When it is applied to a standalone script file where the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> property is specified, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto> value is equivalent to <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Release>.
trans-unit.target: 套用到獨立的指令碼檔案時，<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A>指定屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto>值相當於<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Release>。

trans-unit.source: When it is applied to a script reference in an assembly, <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto> is equivalent to <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Inherit>.
trans-unit.target: 當它套用到組件中的指令碼參考<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto>相當於<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Inherit>。

trans-unit.source: When only <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> is specified, it is used to reference the script.
trans-unit.target: 只有當<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>指定，它用來參考指令碼。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> property are both specified, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> property is used instead of <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>, but the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto> value is still equivalent to <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Inherit>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A>屬性同時指定<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A>而不是使用屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>，但<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto>值等於仍<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Inherit>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to reference a custom control and a JavaScript file that is embedded in the control assembly.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何參考自訂控制項和內嵌控制項組件中的 JavaScript 檔案。

trans-unit.source: The assembly is assumed to be in the Bin folder of the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 組件會假設在網站的 Bin 資料夾中。

trans-unit.source: The custom control animates <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> controls.
trans-unit.target: 自訂控制項繪製<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The JavaScript file is compiled as an embedded resource that is named SampleControl.UpdatePanelAnimation.js.
trans-unit.target: JavaScript 檔就會編譯為 SampleControl.UpdatePanelAnimation.js 名為內嵌資源。

trans-unit.source: You register the embedded JavaScript file by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用註冊內嵌的 JavaScript 檔案<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, compile the JavaScript file that is shown in the example as an embedded resource with the custom control.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此範例中，來編譯 JavaScript 檔案中所顯示的範例做為內嵌的資源，以自訂控制項。

trans-unit.source: Put the resulting assembly into the Bin folder of the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 將產生的組件放入網站的 Bin 資料夾。

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to embed a JavaScript file in an assembly, see [Walkthrough: Embedding a JavaScript File as a Resource in an Assembly](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8cb78cd-95a9-4dc6-92df-391866817e89).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何將 JavaScript 檔案內嵌在組件的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 將 JavaScript 檔案當做資源內嵌在組件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8cb78cd-95a9-4dc6-92df-391866817e89)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a page that uses the custom control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例使用自訂控制項的網頁。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the custom control class definition.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示自訂控制項的類別定義。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the supporting JavaScript file.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示支援的 JavaScript 檔案。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows code that you must add to the AssemblyInfo file of the project that contains the custom control and the JavaScript file.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示您必須加入包含自訂控制項的專案的 AssemblyInfo 檔案和 JavaScript 檔案的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The path of the client script file relative to the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 相對於網頁的用戶端指令碼檔路徑。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" /> class by using a specified path.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的路徑來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The name of the script file that is embedded in the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 內嵌於組件中的指令碼檔名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the assembly that contains the client script file as an embedded resource.
trans-unit.target: 組件的名稱，這個組件包含用戶端指令碼檔做為內嵌資源。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" /> class by using a specified name and assembly.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的名稱和組件來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the assembly that contains the client script file as an embedded resource.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定組件的名稱，這個組件包含用戶端指令碼檔做為內嵌資源。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified or partially qualified name of the assembly that contains a client script file as an embedded resource.
trans-unit.target: 組件的完整或不完整名稱，其中包含做為內嵌資源的用戶端指令碼檔。

trans-unit.source: You set the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A> property when you reference a client script file that is included as an embedded resource in an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 您設定<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A>屬性，當您參考就會包含做為內嵌資源的組件中的用戶端指令碼檔案。

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A> to the fully qualified or partially qualified assembly name.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A>完整或不完整的組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: A fully qualified assembly name includes a name, culture, public key, and version number.
trans-unit.target: 完整組件名稱包括名稱、 文化特性、 公開金鑰和版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: A partially qualified assembly name includes only a name.
trans-unit.target: 完整的組件名稱只包含名稱。

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value for <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A>, you must also specify the name of the embedded resource in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當您指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A>，您也必須指定名稱中的內嵌資源<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 否則，<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: The assembly being referenced must be located in either the Bin folder of the Web site or in the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 被參考組件必須位於網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取中。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to reference a custom control and a JavaScript file that is embedded in the control assembly.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何參考自訂控制項和內嵌控制項組件中的 JavaScript 檔案。

trans-unit.source: The assembly is assumed to be in the Bin folder of the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 組件會假設在網站的 Bin 資料夾中。

trans-unit.source: The custom control animates <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> controls.
trans-unit.target: 自訂控制項繪製<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The JavaScript file is compiled as an embedded resource that is named SampleControl.UpdatePanelAnimation.js.
trans-unit.target: JavaScript 檔就會編譯為 SampleControl.UpdatePanelAnimation.js 名為內嵌資源。

trans-unit.source: You register the embedded JavaScript file by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用註冊內嵌的 JavaScript 檔案<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, compile the JavaScript file that is shown in the example as an embedded resource with the custom control.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此範例中，來編譯 JavaScript 檔案中所顯示的範例做為內嵌的資源，以自訂控制項。

trans-unit.source: Put the resulting assembly into the Bin folder of the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 將產生的組件放入網站的 Bin 資料夾。

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to embed a JavaScript file in an assembly, see [Walkthrough: Embedding a JavaScript File as a Resource in an Assembly](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8cb78cd-95a9-4dc6-92df-391866817e89).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何將 JavaScript 檔案內嵌在組件的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 將 JavaScript 檔案當做資源內嵌在組件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8cb78cd-95a9-4dc6-92df-391866817e89)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a page that uses the custom control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例使用自訂控制項的網頁。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the custom control class definition.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示自訂控制項的類別定義。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the supporting JavaScript file.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示支援的 JavaScript 檔案。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows code that you must add to the AssemblyInfo file of the project that contains the custom control and the JavaScript file.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示您必須加入包含自訂控制項的專案的 AssemblyInfo 檔案和 JavaScript 檔案的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="ScriptManager" /> control on the target Web page.
trans-unit.target: 目標網頁上的 <see langword="ScriptManager" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the script should be compressed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指令碼應進行壓縮，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the URL that is rendered as the value of the <see langword="src" /> attribute of the <see langword="script" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 擷取會轉譯成 <see langword="src" /> 項目之 <see langword="script" /> 屬性值的 URL。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the URL that is rendered as the value of the <see langword="src" /> attribute of the <see langword="script" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含會轉譯成 <see langword="src" /> 項目之 <see langword="script" /> 屬性值的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptPath" /> property is included in the URL when you register a client script file from a resource.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值指出當您註冊資源中的用戶端指令碼檔時，<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptPath" /> 屬性是否包含在 URL 中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the script path is not used when you register the client script; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在註冊用戶端指令碼時未使用指令碼路徑，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You set <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.IgnoreScriptPath%2A> to `true` when you want to register a client script file without including the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptPath%2A> value in the URL of the script file.
trans-unit.target: 您設定<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.IgnoreScriptPath%2A>至`true`當您想要註冊用戶端指令碼檔案，而不會包括<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptPath%2A>指令碼檔案的 URL 中的值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the script reference is an AJAX script.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指令碼參考是否為 AJAX 指令碼。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the script reference is an AJAX script; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指令碼參考是 AJAX 指令碼則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the composite script contains a reference to an ASP.NET AJAX framework script.
trans-unit.target: 指出複合指令碼是否要包含對 ASP.NET AJAX 架構指令碼的參考。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the composite script contains a reference to an ASP.NET AJAX framework script; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果複合指令碼包含對 ASP.NET AJAX 架構指令碼的參考，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the embedded resource that contains the client script file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定內嵌資源的名稱，這個資源包含用戶端指令碼檔。

trans-unit.source: The name of the client script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端指令碼檔的名稱，這個會檔案內嵌在組件中做為資源。

trans-unit.source: You set the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> property to reference a client script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 您設定<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>屬性來參考組件中內嵌為資源的用戶端指令碼檔案。

trans-unit.source: If you define values for both the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> properties in the same script reference, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果您可以定義兩個值<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>在相同的指令碼參考中，屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A>屬性會優先。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to reference a custom control and a JavaScript file that is embedded in the control assembly.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何參考自訂控制項和內嵌控制項組件中的 JavaScript 檔案。

trans-unit.source: The assembly is assumed to be in the Bin folder of the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 組件會假設在網站的 Bin 資料夾中。

trans-unit.source: The custom control animates <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> controls.
trans-unit.target: 自訂控制項繪製<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The JavaScript file is compiled as an embedded resource that is named SampleControl.UpdatePanelAnimation.js.
trans-unit.target: JavaScript 檔就會編譯為 SampleControl.UpdatePanelAnimation.js 名為內嵌資源。

trans-unit.source: You register the embedded JavaScript file by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用註冊內嵌的 JavaScript 檔案<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, compile the JavaScript file that is shown in the example as an embedded resource with the custom control.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此範例中，來編譯 JavaScript 檔案中所顯示的範例做為內嵌的資源，以自訂控制項。

trans-unit.source: Put the resulting assembly into the Bin folder of the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 將產生的組件放入網站的 Bin 資料夾。

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to embed a JavaScript file in an assembly, see [Walkthrough: Embedding a JavaScript File as a Resource in an Assembly](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8cb78cd-95a9-4dc6-92df-391866817e89).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何將 JavaScript 檔案內嵌在組件的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 將 JavaScript 檔案當做資源內嵌在組件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8cb78cd-95a9-4dc6-92df-391866817e89)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a page that uses the custom control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例使用自訂控制項的網頁。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the custom control class definition.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示自訂控制項的類別定義。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the supporting JavaScript file.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示支援的 JavaScript 檔案。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows code that you must add to the AssemblyInfo file of the project that contains the custom control and the JavaScript file.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示您必須加入包含自訂控制項的專案的 AssemblyInfo 檔案和 JavaScript 檔案的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name" /> property, the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path" /> property, or the type name.
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串，表示 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name" /> 屬性、<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path" /> 屬性或型別名稱的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name" /> property if it is defined, or the value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path" /> property if it is defined; otherwise, the value of the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果已定義 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name" /> 屬性，便會傳回其值，或者，如果已定義 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path" /> 屬性，便會傳回其值，否則，會傳回 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name" /> 屬性的值。
